summary: An Ordinance authorizing the Mayor and City Comptroller to issue Local Improvement Bonds for the improvement of Fifteenth Avenue West from the south margin of the Newton Street to north margin of West Armour Street, et al in the City of Seattle, by grading under Ordinance No. 18817, creating Local Improvement District No. 1809 prescribing the rate of interest thereon and authorizing their delivery to the contractor constructing the improvement.
